pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==========esptool.py==========A Python-based, open-source, platform-independent utility to communicate with the ROM bootloader in Espressif chips.The esptool.py project is `hosted on github <https://github.com/espressif/esptool>`_.Documentation-------------Visit online `esptool documentation <https://docs.espressif.com/projects/esptool/>`_ or run ``esptool.py -h``.Contributing------------Please see the `contributions guide <https://docs.espressif.com/projects/esptool/en/latest/contributing.html>`_.
